title: Did Diane Fenstein get her husband's USPS contract?
subtitle: Richard Bloom, Senator Diane Vinstein ' s husband, obtained a brokering contract in the sale of USPS facilities, but there is no evidence that it was because of his wife ' s influence.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Richard Bloom, Senator Diane Vinstein ' s husband, obtained a brokering contract in the sale of USPS facilities because of his wife ' s influence.
